description: This course offers a focused look at loss of control and winter driving skill development. We start with the basics and work our way up to exercises you can practice to build confidence and understanding. The truth is, our diverse climate often challenges the most experienced driver. From snow & sleet to heavy rain and fog, many drivers feel intimidated while driving in these conditions. This can make driving stressful and very dangerous. It's time to learn some valuable information that will help you feel more confident with how your vehicle interacts with the adverse weather. This class is designed for all ages and all experience levels and is a MUST for every Driver! You can also purchase the DVD as well to review the material at TheWinterDriver dot com.
title: The Winter Driver
